TopicTitle: Hello, may we see many explosions, intentional or otherwise!

Articles.Content: Hello KSP Forum! Guess this is an intro, so I should introduce myself! I'm new to the forums but have been playing KSP for a while by now! I love space and engineering, as well as military technology(Missile trucks that destroy VAB's anyone?)! I'm going to stop exclaiming things now! Can't wait to have some fun discussions. I like to(attempt to) write science fiction sometimes, and almost all of my writing seems to center around artificial intelligence or futuristic warfare. I'm great at thinking of ideas, though not carrying them out. I'm practically addicted to mods, I can't live without FAR/NEAR, and it's hardship without realchute. You know, the essentials. I also like ID Skillful, and I make fighter planes, which Firespitter helps with. I've tried interstellar, but it confuses me like crazy! It's all an avalanche of mods. Anyways, I hope I fit in well to this community! Have a nice day, and remember, Curiosity could not have killed the cat, because it was on Mars the whole time. It has an alibi. So leave Curiosity alone.
Welcome Solarspaceprobe! Have fun here, its a nice place full of awesome people and useful explosive knowledge (and useful insanity). See you around!

Thanks Frank! I'll keep the SRB's ready and FAR, FAR away from the barbeque. Oh. Nevermind, the warehouse is full, I guess we'll just put it next to the water tank and pure sodium.

Edited November 2, 2014 by Solarspaceprobe
Forgot half of post.
Also try out BDArmory, It's a lot simpler than Skillful. If you get lost with part searching, download part catalog.

Yeah, I might use BD while waiting for the release...but I like skillful's damage model, as well as some of the components so much more. I DID once make armor plates that would supposedly work with BD armory(structural panels with their tolerance/weight/cost values boosted a bunch), but I don't like how a machine gun has the ability to take down a tank in that mod. You're right though, I'll download it now and see if I can make a cool battle scene.
Wow, nevermind, really misjudged BD, it's pretty awesome.

Space Probes? THATS MY JOB!

Actually, though, welcome aboard. Its nice to have a fellow Boom-Expert on board

Yeah, I might use BD while waiting for the release...but I like skillful's damage model, as well as some of the components so much more. I DID once make armor plates that would supposedly work with BD armory(structural panels with their tolerance/weight/cost values boosted a bunch), but I don't like how a machine gun has the ability to take down a tank in that mod. You're right though, I'll download it now and see if I can make a cool battle scene.

Yeah, I agree that its a bit stupid that you can destroy a tank with .50cal gun.
